thought.text: ## Phase 1: Reading and Understanding the Problem

task_list.title: Phase 1: Read and understand the problem
task_list.notes: Analyzing the issue description and understanding what needs to be fixed

task_list.title: Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests
task_list.notes: Explore the repository structure and understand how to run tests

task_list.title: Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files
task_list.notes: Use grep to find SkyCoord class and __getattr__ method

task_list.title: Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue
task_list.notes: Create a minimal script that reproduces the misleading error message

task_list.title: Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution
task_list.notes: Understand exactly what needs to be changed in the __getattr__ method

task_list.title: Phase 6: Implement the fix
task_list.notes: Make minimal changes to fix the attribute access error message

task_list.title: Phase 7: Verify the implementation
task_list.notes: Test the fix with reproduction script and edge cases

task_list.title: Phase 8: Final review and testing
task_list.notes: Run existing tests to ensure no regressions

function.arguments: {"security_risk": "LOW", "command": "plan", "task_list": [{"title": "Phase 1: Read and understand the problem", "status": "in_progress", "notes": "Analyzing the issue description and understanding what needs to be fixed"}, {"title": "Phase 2: Set up environment and run tests", "status": "todo", "notes": "Explore the repository structure and understand how to run tests"}, {"title": "Phase 3: Explore codebase to find relevant files", "status": "todo", "notes": "Use grep to find SkyCoord class and __getattr__ method"}, {"title": "Phase 4: Create test script to reproduce the issue", "status": "todo", "notes": "Create a minimal script that reproduces the misleading error message"}, {"title": "Phase 5: Analyze the problem and solution", "status": "todo", "notes": "Understand exactly what needs to be changed in the __getattr__ method"}, {"title": "Phase 6: Implement the fix", "status": "todo", "notes": "Make minimal changes to fix the attribute access error message"}, {"title": "Phase 7: Verify the implementation", "status": "todo", "notes": "Test the fix with reproduction script and edge cases"}, {"title": "Phase 8: Final review and testing", "status": "todo", "notes": "Run existing tests to ensure no regressions"}]}
function.name: task_tracker
